content: try out this crochet poppy applique pattern link to youtube video https //youtu be/eghenkjlt20 skill level easy format pdf and video stitches and abbreviations this pattern is written in us terminology st/sts stitch/stitches slip_stitch slip_stitch chain chain single_crochet single_crochet half_double_crochet half_double_crochet tools and materials -5 mm crochet hook -bernat premium #4 worsted medium -red and black -yarn needle -scissors final size - diameter is 5 5 cm
